name: 给开心女孩
content: 没有人能够告诉你爱是什么
没有人能够判定你是对是错
年轻的梦想 女孩 要尽情把握
青春的憧憬 要热情地追求
擦干眼泪 做个开心的我
拥有生命中最美的时刻
Maybe right maybe wrong
We know love is changing the world
Something deep in my heart
The fire is burning in my soul
So many dreamings
We strive to make them appear
How can you understand
All I need is only a friend
Wipe off your tears and don t be afraid
I do everything with my own way
Maybe right maybe wrong
